name: Zoo Tycoon
description: Script for installing Zoo Tycoon. My copy happens to be Zoo Tycoon: Complete Collection, but this might work with other versions too.
notes:
Due to the copy protection, this game will not run until the exe file has been patched to remove aforementioned protection.

I've experienced some hangs shortly after changing the resolution setting, but the game seems to run fine under Wine 4.2-Staging otherwise .
content:
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/Microsoft Games/Zoo Tycoon/zoo.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
  working_dir: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/Microsoft Games/Zoo Tycoon
installer:
- insert-disc:
    requires: Autorun.exe
- task:
    arch: win32
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    executable: $DISC/Autorun.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
